situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The fangtooth has four friends that are easy going and four friends that are not. The fangtooth is watching a movie from 1955. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: The living creature that reveals something that is supposed to be a secret to the chihuahua will also suspect the truthfulness of the wolf, without a doubt. Rule2: Regarding the fangtooth, if it is watching a movie that was released before the first man landed on moon, then we can conclude that it reveals a secret to the chihuahua.
question: Based on the game state and the rules and preferences, does the fangtooth suspect the truthfulness of the wolf?
label: proved
